snippet.title: Toilet Ninjas: Candy Edition gameplay trailer! (iOS)
snippet.description:
There's no time to waste! You have 60 seconds per round to use your Ninja's arsenal to prevent the candy from clogging the toilet. Can you make it to the end and become a Master Toilet Ninja?

App Store Link:   https://apps.apple.com/us/app/toilet-ninjas/id1444706930

Toilet Ninjas Features:

- Arcade style gameplay 
- Score driven 
- Score multipliers 
- Leaderboards
- Achievements
- Earn higher ranks
- Giant boss battles
- Purchase new weapons 
- Is beatable
